mapper.insert: insert into zt_car_history_${month} ( lic_number, sim_number, longitude, latitude, speed, altitude, direction, box_up, box_empty, box_close, state, report_time ) values ( '${locationInfo.licNumber}', '${locationInfo.simNumber}', ${locationInfo.longitude}, ${locationInfo.latitude}, ${locationInfo.speed}, ${locationInfo.altitude}, ${locationInfo.direction}, ${locationInfo.boxUp}, ${locationInfo.boxEmpty}, ${locationInfo.boxClose}, '${locationInfo.state}', '${locationInfo.reportTime}' )
